He loved he vibe, especially at sunset where we stood by the trendy Ku De Ta bar with all the beautiful people. I agree about the good vibe, but I just found this beach rather dirty and grubby. Water like sludge, rubbish everywhere and people hassling you to buy their wares.
review: love beach trave partner like seminyak love vibe especially sunset stood trendy ku de ta bar beautiful people agree good vibe find rather dirty grubby water sludge rubbish everywhere people hassle buy ware

Content: The beach was really dirty when we were there. I'm not sure why they don't pay people to cleanup the beachfront, even the hotels don't clean up in their beaches out front.
review: really dirty im sure dont pay people cleanup beachfront even hotel dont clean beach front

Content: I ve been for a jog in the morning around 6am. It was a ride between trash, plastic bags, flip flops... Tourist should come early to see that. Luck some truck clean that before most of the people arrive. A real shame.
review: ve jog morning around 6am ride trash plastic bag flip flop tourist come early see luck truck clean people arrive real shame

Content: Be aware of huge waves and streams sometimes . It is much safer in the afternoon.................................................................
review: aware huge wave stream sometimes much safe afternoon

Content: Seminyak beach is the perfect spot for the sunset.It's just amazing! The beach is huge, you can enjoy the sunset from anywhere you'd like.Surfing lessons recommended, so cheap!
review: seminyak perfect spot sunsetits amazing huge enjoy sunset anywhere youd likesurfing lesson recommend cheap

Content: Nice beach with strong waves good for surfing. Nice restaurant by beach makes up for good vibes. Must do in Bali. Great massage place by beach
review: nice strong wave good surf nice restaurant make good vibe must bali great massage place

Content: A national tragedy to see the mountains of rubbish washing up on to this iconic beach, as tourists lounged on rented beach chairs. What a mess. At each of the big beachfront venues, workers were hopelessly attempting to clear away the relentless pollution. On 25 Dec 2018 the Mayor announced he was banning single use plastics - they are thrown in to rivers by villagers then washed into the ocean during the rainy seasons.
review: national tragedy see mountain rubbish wash iconic tourist lounge rent chair mess big beachfront venues worker hopelessly attempt clear away relentless pollution 25 dec 2018 mayor announce ban single use plastic thrown river villager wash ocean rainy season

Content: It was definitely a good plan during honeymoon to have a relax romantic dinner at the beach. There is also live band singing and it is an option to give tips. the seafood is fresh and they do serve tiger prawn, and variety of fish.
review: definitely good plan honeymoon relax romantic dinner live band sing option give tip seafood fresh serve tiger prawn variety fish

Content: we went in the afternoon. didn't find it particularly nice and the beach is littered with ciggie butts
review: go afternoon didnt find particularly nice litter ciggie butt

Content: Seminyak is your typical beach except its not as crowded as Kuta Beach. Vendors do come up to you to buy stuff, but if you say no nicely they dont linger around. The water is very clean and its lovely to go for a dip :)
review: seminyak typical except crowd kuta vendor come buy stuff say nicely dont linger around water clean lovely go dip

Content: seminyak beach just wonderful and relax. set with nice coach on beach and you can just enjoy your romantic dinner there. no fancy dressing but relax beach wear! lovely!
review: seminyak wonderful relax set nice coach enjoy romantic dinner fancy dress relax wear lovely

Content: Nice beach to surf and chill. Have some drinks at one of the beach clubs or even better, stay at one of the 5 Star hotels and enjoy the beautiful sunsets.
review: nice surf chill drink one club even well stay one 5 star hotel enjoy beautiful sunset

Content: Once you go past Legian beach you are on Seminyak Beach.There are also some high end hotels on the vicinity and I noted that it was less busier here.A nice place to have a stroll, popular with surfers and it was relatively clean.
review: go past legian seminyak beachthere high end hotel vicinity note less busy herea nice place stroll popular surfer relatively clean

Content: Just returned from a amazing trip to Bali, where during our 14 day adventure we visited Ubud, Sanur, Nusa Dua and Seminyak which unfortunately was the low point of our trip. We had been to Seminyak on a previous visit to Bali and didn't have any problems but this time We fell foul of unscrupulous money changers. They used misdirection and slight of hand to scam us out of approx 1 million Rupiahs. My advice is stick to the main money changers on main roads and always double check your cash before walking away. I went back and confronted my foe's and they claimed that i had dropped the money as I walked away which of course was rubbish, I did however manage to get half of the ill gotten gains back from them when they thought i might have called the police.
review: return amazing trip bali 14 day adventure visit ubud sanur nusa dua seminyak unfortunately low point trip seminyak previous visit bali didnt problem time fell foul unscrupulous money changer use misdirection slight hand scam u approx 1 million rupiah advice stick main money changer main road always double check cash walk away go back confront foe claim drop money walk away course rubbish manage half ill gotten gain back think might call police

Content: Good bars for lively fun but might be too busy for those requiring a more relaxed atmosphere. Not far to walk to quieter beaches though, giving you options.
review: good bar lively fun might busy require relaxed atmosphere far walk quiet beach though give option

Content: As a keen swimmer I was slightly disappointed that the waves and surf were too strong to go swimming. The beach is large and flat, and you can walk along it for miles. There are plenty of people hiring loungers etc. We liked all the beach bars with their brightly coloured bean bags! At night the beach comes alive, with beautiful sunsets and bands/ singers at most of the beach bars. Very relaxing except for the hawkers of which there were many! Just saw a review below about effluent and can agree - upon walking northwards along the beach towards seminyak square, there was quite a fast flowing creek that stunk. Take care where you bathe I think! There were also dogs running around and on our walks we did pass the occasional dog turd. We did see people cleaning the beach and overall it was pretty clean with just a few trouble spots.
review: keen swimmer slightly disappointed wave surf strong go swim large flat walk along mile plenty people hire lounger etc like bar brightly colour bean bag night come alive beautiful sunset band singer bar relax except hawker many saw review effluent agree upon walk northward along towards seminyak square quite fast flow creek stunk take care bathe think dog run around walk pass occasional dog turd see people clean overall pretty clean trouble spot

Content: Astonished at the filthy beach and locals using drains to beach as a toilet. All the people lazing around you'd think some of them could pick up on the beaches and though a fares.
review: astonish filthy local use drain toilet people laze around youd think pick beach though fare

Content: Loved the beach - rented beach chairs from the locals.  who were very attentive.  Always there to bring you beers or coconut drinks
review: love rented chair local attentive always bring beer coconut drink

Content: Gorgeous beach with amazing sunsets! Was very clean, not ridiculously busy, absolutely beautiful and if i could watch sunsets from there every day it would be heaven!
review: gorgeous amaze sunset clean ridiculously busy absolutely beautiful watch sunset every day heaven

Content: In december there were few people so that we have a lovely morning in the sea. The waves made funnier our stay at the beach. The weather was fantastic.
review: december people lovely morning sea wave make funny stay weather fantastic

Content: The color of the sea water and the sand is not as what I imagined. The water is not blue, the sand is dark, rough and not white. But I do appreciate the beauty of the Mother Nature there. Strong waves are perfect for surfing. The beach is clean, food is great, though a little expensive - but still worth it! (I stayed there 3 nights and all restaurants in the area turned out amazing). I just wish they have more seafood restaurants that would sell more of lobsters, mantis, crabs... I couldnt find one though, most of the restaurants serve little prawns, sea bass, scallop, some other kinds of fish only. Maybe I would search for more next time.
review: color sea water sand imagine water blue sand dark rough white appreciate beauty mother nature strong wave perfect surf clean food great though little expensive still worth stay 3 night restaurant area turn amazing wish seafood restaurant sell lobster mantis crabs couldnt find one though restaurant serve little prawns sea bass scallop kind fish maybe search next time

Content: Sitting on the bean bag enjoying my bintang beer at night. I took a blur bird taxi from kerobokan about 2km away from my villa to the beach side, there is a minimum charges for 30000 rupiah. Enjoying the music and sea wave.
review: sit bean bag enjoy bintang beer night take blur bird taxi kerobokan 2km away villa side minimum charge 30000 rupiah enjoy music sea wave

Content: Definitely not what I expected especially from all the hype. Beach and sea water seemed rather dirty and it was too crowded with vendors.
review: definitely expect especially hype sea water seem rather dirty crowd vendor

Content: I would like to visit this place every time I come back to Bali. If you want to chill with your friends then this is the place to go. Sadly couldn't experience sunset but I can imagine the beauty it would add to the already beautiful surrounding.
review: visit place every time come back bali want chill friends place go sadly couldnt experience sunset imagine beauty add already beautiful surround

Content: went on a overcast morning, the water was warm, wave was nice and sand was not over heated like it would be on a sunny day.
review: go overcast morning water warm wave nice sand heat sunny day

Content: Nice beach, better than Seminyak itself. Can find a quiet place away from others. Watch for dangerous currents.
review: nice well seminyak find quiet place away others watch dangerous current

Content: Seminyak Beach is one of the cleaner and more inviting beaches Iâ€™ve visited in Bali (mainland Bali that is, the Gilis and Lombok have amazing beaches) and I enjoyed a few long walks and a swim with family. The surf is good for body boarding and catching waves as well (though donâ€™t drink and swim if youâ€™re inexperienced, my brother had to pull a guy out of the water who could have drowned). The water was nice and I didnâ€™t encounter rubbish like I have before further south at Legian (there was a tiny creek flowing into the ocean to cross which was a bit dirty but that was all) and there werenâ€™t many sellers or hawkers at the section where we stayed (just near Potato Head, Alila & Mrs Sippy bars). If you can get a hotel or villa in this area youâ€™d do well as itâ€™s not too overcrowded and itâ€™s a quality stretch of beach close to some excellent restaurants and bars.
review: seminyak one clean inviting beach ive visit bali mainland bali gilis lombok amazing beach enjoy long walks swim family surf good body board catch wave well though dont drink swim youre inexperienced brother pull guy water drown water nice didnt encounter rubbish south legian tiny creek flow ocean cross bit dirty werent many seller hawker section stay near potato head alila mr sippy bar hotel villa area youd well overcrowded quality stretch close excellent restaurant bar

Content: The beach itself isn't really that pretty as it has mostly black volcanic sand and alot of the gutter water from the island runs across the sand into the sea, which doesn't smell to clean. But through the day it's great for surfing and at sunset it comes alive with music. So good if that's what your after.
review: isnt really pretty mostly black volcanic sand alot gutter water island run across sand sea doesnt smell clean day great surf sunset come alive music good thats

Content: We stayed at the Anatara Resort on the beach and took a stroll across the beach and it was splendid. We managed to walk for over a couple of miles without any hesitation or break. The beech is cleaner and nicer than the one at Kuta and lesser people come here. There are plenty of inexpensive places to dine on the beach and have a couple of beers. Worth spending time here than KUTA .
review: stay anatara resort take stroll across splendid manage walk couple mile without hesitation break beech clean nicer one kuta less people come plenty inexpensive place dine couple beer worth spending time kuta

Content: It has an amazing Sunset and the beach is really clean and you can just sit on the many shacks on the beach and enjoy the sunset alongwith a drink
review: amazing sunset really clean sit many shack enjoy sunset alongwith drink

Content: Good to spend the afternoon here watching beautiful sunset across the sea. They have lots of cafes stretching alongside the beach where you can sit and relax with some fresh cocktails.Anticipate for some souvenirs sellers offering you to buy their stuffs. They can be annoying sometimes, so you better refuse politely if you aren't interested in the beginning yo avoid them from pestering you.
review: good spend afternoon watch beautiful sunset across sea lot cafes stretch alongside sit relax fresh cocktailsanticipate souvenir seller offer buy stuff annoy sometimes well refuse politely arent interested begin yo avoid pestering

Content: Pantai yang cantik cuma terlalu ramai. Probably kerna saya dan teman-teman ke sana pas malam New Year. We had fun its just that hujan renyai-renyai buat rasa kurang enak. But the party went on until late of course.Seminyak is a definite beach to visit when you are in Bali. Looove it. Will definitely come back.
review: pantai yang cantik cuma terlalu ramai probably kerna saya dan temanteman ke sana pa malam new year fun hujan renyairenyai buat rasa kurang enak party go late courseseminyak definite visit bali looove will definitely come back

Content: I canâ€™t say I have ever seen that much domestic waste being washed up on the beach. It is being cleaned many times during the day but not great to go in the sea.
review: cant say see much domestic waste wash clean many time day great go sea

Content: If I have to give some very useful advice, skip Seminyak beach and go straight to Legian or Kuta beach (10 minutesâ€™ walk). It basically looks the same, only difference is that the rental beds, drinks, food etc are half the price there. We found Legian beach best, since it was not crowded but also affordable.
review: give useful advice skip seminyak go straight legian kuta 10 minute walk basically look difference rental bed drink food etc half price find legian best crowd affordable

Content: Clean and slightly rough sand beach.  Beach facilities are just ok kind of. We were using Marriott beach facilities.
review: clean slightly rough sand facility ok kind use marriott facility

Content: very nice beach and busy but not so crowded. many good bars at the beach to enjoy the sunset by a cocktail.
review: nice busy crowd many good bar enjoy sunset cocktail

Content: Not much impressed with this beach, very average and some those in Vietnam or Malaysia definitely will be better choice
review: much impressed average vietnam malaysia definitely will better choice
